title: SMC_DIRECTION (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_DIRECTION :
This enumeration variable indicates the current interpolation direction
of the FB instance. Possible states:

rows.Name: IPO_positive
rows.Comment:
Interpolation is ongoing in positive direction (along the
original path)

rows.Name: IPO_negative
rows.Comment:
Interpolation is ongoing in negative direction
(in opposite direction to the original path)
